name: Signature Series Robusto
additionalNotes:
Halfwheel - Two years after being announced, the Nomad Signature Series will finally be available to retailers nationwide.

Nomad Cigar Co. will bring the four-size line to the 2018 IPCPR Convention & Trade Show. Itâ€™s made at Fabrica Oveja Negra, the factory behind Black Label Trading Co., using an Ecuadorian maduro wrapper, a binder from Ecuador and fillers from Nicaragua.
